name: 【VTMjam】横浜の鬼札/the Joker in Yokohama
description:
This game was created by Quirt(@Quirt_co_jp).

This is a simple novel game in which the main character, a human being, talks to a vampire in the city of Yokohama.

The English version will be added at a later date because the localization of the text has not been completed.

Tips are available in Japanese, so you can only browse them.

I made the game for the first time, it was really hard (I had a stomachache), but please enjoy it! !!

If you are a volunteer who wants to translate, please translate this game.

ps.

I'm really sorry I couldn't make it in time for localization because I played too much and I was really close to the time! At Aishiteru!

げーむをつくったのはきるとです。

このノベルゲームはVTM5eに基づいたビジュアルノベルゲームです。

主人公は人間で、選択肢によって抱擁してもらえます。ですがお楽しみください。

お腹痛いです　は
